name: Santa's Gift Leaving!
description:
Christmas season is near and it is time for Santa to leave new gifts to everyone!

I present to you the official entry for the GJL Game Parade Jam with the theme, "Leave Something Behind". I took a different approach to this theme as gift giving will leave a mark for everyone. This time, you can use Santa to give gifts to everyone especially if you are nice! Ensure that you keep this as a secret. Finish giving and leaving the gifts in other people's doorsteps before the time runs out. 

You can control Santa by using WASD key.

Use E key to pick-up the gifts or drop them to the door steps.

Use Esc key to open the menu.

This game is solo developed but the assets where obtained and edited in a way usable for the game jam. All credits are in the Credits portion of the Main Menu in the game. Time spent everyday is 1-2 hours only due to busy schedule for work but was able to make a game that might last for 10-15 mins. More levels to come after the jam if revisited/have positive feedback.

I hope you guys enjoy it and Merry Christmas everyone! :D
